item.description:
We will be joining Global Expeditions Club members from all over the US and Canada on an exciting adventure to Greece!

Join your fellow travel club members from June 11 - 18, 2011 on this exciting 8 day adventure to Greece: Athens & the Islands – 8 Days Join us as we go island hopping in the crystal blue waters of the Greek Islands. First we'll explore the historic city of Athens, then take high-speed ferries to visit the fun and wild side of the island of Mykonos and the stunning beauty of the island of Santorini.

This group trip is a fantastic way to see the beauty of the Greek Islands with a group of fun, like-minded adventurers.

Want to see what other club members are saying? Then check out the Global Expeditions Club's Testimonials Page

Price: $1,899 pp, plus airfare

For prices, details or to book your space on this tour, follow this link: www.HeadOutAdventures.com

(NOTE: Head Out Adventures is the club's tour supplier for this group trip)

---------------------------------------------------------------

Included in the awesome adventure:
* 7 nights in 3 to 4 star hotels
* Full day guided tour of Athens
* Airport pickup and transfer to hotel in Athens
* Full day sightseeing and winery tour in Santorini
* Guided tours as mentioned in itinerary with expert English speaking local guides
* Global Expeditions Club English speaking Trip Leader
* Breakfast daily
* Entrance fees to all sites as indicated in the itinerary
* All transfers as indicated in modern air-conditioned vehicles and high speed ferries
Places Visited: Greece Group Tour, Athens, Mykonos, Santorini, Acropolis of Athens, Ancient Agora, Theatre of Dionysos, Roman Agora, Kerameikos Temple of Olympian Zeus, and Hadrian's Library.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------

This group tour is being organized by the Global Expeditions Club: an international adventure travel club with over 11,000+ members. The tour operator that they are using to coordinate, book and run this trip is: Head Out Adventures. For more information visit their websites or contact the Global Expeditions Club at:

E-mail: info@GlobalExpeditionsClub.com
Phone: 1.617.645.7689

And, of course, if you have any questions you can always contact me or one of the other organizers through a meetup email!!

Make Friends. Travel the World
item.name: Greece - Athens & the Islands - 8 Days
